title: Magento Ecommerce Bug Fixes and Merchant Account Linking
snippet:
http://104.238.72.106/~ouulgolf/
We are in the process of finishing an ecommerce build, and need a developer to come in and finish out some bug fixes. 
-Zoom function (see attached site audit)
~Zoom function is not consistent. Need all images to zoom consistently, and zoom in closely (like this bag: http://104.238.72.106/~ouulgolf/python-collection/super-light-cart-bags-python/15-way-cart-bag-pro-blue-ryl-wht.html)

-Connect merchant account so clients can accept payments. Will provide credentials and access.

-Create Returns form for customers that need to return a product. 

Upon commencing this contract, will provide access to our project management system, Teamwork, so you can view project notes and statuses. I will also put you in contact with our current developer.
